statements: DELETE FROM training_plans WHERE plan_id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_plans WHERE distance > 10 AND pace < 6.0;
DELETE FROM training_plans WHERE start_date < '2021-08-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM daily_workouts WHERE workout_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30' AND distance > 10;
DELETE FROM workouts WHERE day = '2022-01-15' AND distance > 10.0;
DELETE FROM Workout_Duration WHERE day_id IN (SELECT day_id FROM Training_Days WHERE plan_id = 2);
DELETE FROM Distance_Training WHERE day_id IN (SELECT day_id FROM Training_Days WHERE plan_id = 2);
